ygData.subject: Re: Even more on ebw...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you ... with ... You need the mold, the hilt, and the electrum. Then just hit combine, no skill needed. You get the hilt by giving Arlena s lute to
ygData.messageBody:
> Ok so let's say I have the hilt, the blade, and an enchanted bar of
> electrum.
> Is it as simple as combining them or do you need blacksmithy? I've heard
you
> do but I heard the same thing about the Thex Mallet and I combined that
with
> a big 0 in smithing.
> Anyone know?

You need the mold, the hilt, and the electrum. Then just hit combine, no
skill needed.

You get the hilt by giving Arlena's lute to Grimrot. He also gives you a
note, which you take to Dekam N'Tazi in Qeynos. Give him the note, he gives
you the mold. Then get some electrum, have a friend enchant it, then combine
the hilt and electrum in the mold.

DV
